column3: Please be advised that this is private property. Unless you have pertinent business here, I must ask you to leave.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! How goes it? All's well here! ...At least on the bookkeeping front, anyway.
Some people let fame swell their heads, but I believe that yours will remain in proportion <Emphasis>and</Emphasis> firmly attached to your body!

Good <If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),12))><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),4))>evening<Else/>morrow</If><Else/><If(LessThan(PlayerParameter(11),17))>day<Else/>evening</If></If>, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! I trust your investigation is faring well!

<sigh> Our numbers have swelled so much of late, it takes an <Emphasis>age</Emphasis> to keep records up to date.
...Hee hee, that rhymes!
Oh, and I hope you don't mind, but I took the liberty of drawing a pretty little flower next to your name. This way I can find you quickly!
The entire headquarters is up in arms! I can scarce stay abreast of all the goings-on!

When you came to our rescue, I couldn't see five yalms ahead me for the tears of joy.
...I need not tell you that this is strictly for your ears only!
The Garlean threat may have abated, but there is no end to the work we Scions do.
In our own unique ways, may every one of us continue striving to make a better Eorzea!
